function.name: xmlelemnew
function.help: Creates an XML document object element

parameter.name: xmlobj
parameter.help: The name of an XML object. An XML document or an element.

parameter.name: namespace
parameter.help: URI of the namespace to which this element belongs.

parameter.name: childname
parameter.help: The name of the element to create. This element becomes a child element of xmlObj in the tree.
